## Exercises

### Exercise 1

```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)

```


```{r glimpse-data}
dplyr::glimpse(Teams)
```

The `Teams` dataset has 3015 observations and 48 variables.

### Exercise 2
```{r}
view(Teams)
```
```{r}
mets <- Teams  %>% 
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets %>% 
  dplyr::filter(yearID >=2004 & yearID <=2012)
my_mets %>% 
  dplyr::select(yearID,W,L,teamID)
```

...

### Exercise 3
```{r}
mets_ben <- Teams %>%
  dplyr::select(yearID, teamID, R, RA, W, L) %>%
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN" & yearID %in% 2004:2012)

```
```{r}
view(mets_ben)
```

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
  dplyr::rename(RUN_ALLOWED = RA)    # new name = old name
mets_ben
```
